Deliverables: Beta environment running, Monitoring dashboard, Database loaded, Logging configured
Success Criteria: All services start, API responds, Dashboards display data, Database contains test data
Notes: Run setup script and verify all components

Deliverables: API documentation, Postman collection, Error handling tests, Performance baseline
Success Criteria: All endpoints respond, Error handling works, Response times <5s, Auth/rate limiting functional
Notes: Test all platform endpoints (classification, risk, compliance, auth)

Deliverables: Web interface deployed, User auth functional, Classification form working, Dashboard operational
Success Criteria: Web interface loads, Auth works, Forms submit, Results display, Role access functional
Notes: Deploy web interface and test all user flows

Deliverables: Test results report, Edge cases list, Recommendations, Baseline accuracy
Success Criteria: >90% accuracy, All scenarios execute, Edge cases documented, Confidence scores correlate

Deliverables: Performance test results, Resource utilization graphs, Benchmarks, Bottleneck identification
Success Criteria: Response time <5s, Handles 100 users, Resource utilization within limits, No degradation

Deliverables: Onboarding guide, API documentation, Troubleshooting guide, Video tutorials, FAQ
Success Criteria: Documentation covers features, Videos clear, FAQ addresses questions, API docs complete

Deliverables: Feedback API endpoints, Survey collection, Analytics tracking, Data export
Success Criteria: Feedback via API, Surveys formatted, Analytics collecting, Data exportable

Deliverables: Security audit report, Compliance checklist, Security recommendations, Risk assessment
Success Criteria: No critical vulnerabilities, Data handling compliant, Auth working, Rate limiting prevents abuse

Deliverables: Team training completed, Support procedures, Escalation matrix, Monitoring responsibilities
Success Criteria: Team understands process, Procedures clear, Responsibilities defined, Escalation paths established
Notes: Train team on beta testing process

Deliverables: Web interface integrated, Auth flow working, Role access functional, Error handling working
Success Criteria: Web interface communicates with API, Auth tokens work, Permissions enforced, Error messages displayed
Notes: Test web interface integration with API backend

Deliverables: Recruitment templates, 100+ contacts list, 20-30 confirmed users, Recruitment metrics
Success Criteria: 20-30 users confirmed, Diverse segments, >15% response rate, Target markets represented

Deliverables: Access credentials, Onboarding calls, Training materials, User accounts
Success Criteria: All users can access, Users understand features, Materials helpful, Users feel supported

Deliverables: Real-time monitoring, Alert system, User activity tracking, Dashboard access
Success Criteria: Alerts trigger, Activity tracked, Performance monitored, Dashboard shows data

Deliverables: Daily reports, Support tickets resolved, Feedback collected, Issue escalation log
Success Criteria: >99% uptime, Issues resolved in 24h, >80% feedback collected, No critical issues unaddressed

Deliverables: Weekly analysis report, Performance metrics, Issue prioritization, Improvement recommendations
Success Criteria: Feedback analyzed in 24h, Trends identified, Issues prioritized, Recommendations actionable

Deliverables: Mid-beta report, User interview summaries, Performance analysis, Adjustment recommendations
Success Criteria: User satisfaction >7/10, Positive engagement, Critical issues identified, Clear path forward

Deliverables: Public announcement, Self-service registration, 100+ additional users, Registration metrics
Success Criteria: 100+ total users, Self-service works, Onboarding automated, Registration rate meets targets

Deliverables: Infrastructure scaled, Performance optimized, Enhanced monitoring, Scaling procedures
Success Criteria: Handles 100+ users, Performance <5s, Monitoring covers all, Procedures clear

Deliverables: Analytics dashboard, Usage analysis, User journey mapping, Optimization recommendations
Success Criteria: Analytics provide insights, Patterns identified, Journey optimized, Recommendations implemented

Deliverables: A/B testing framework, Test results, Winning variations, Improvements implemented
Success Criteria: Clear results, Statistical significance, Winning variations improve metrics, Positive user impact

Deliverables: Comprehensive report, Data analysis presentation, Key insights, Recommendations
Success Criteria: All data analyzed, Clear insights, Success metrics evaluated, Actionable recommendations

Deliverables: Feedback synthesis report, Feature prioritization, Satisfaction analysis, User needs documentation
